claim: The Land Before Time's director was Don Bluth.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Donald Virgil `` Don '' Bluth  (  born September 13 , 1937  )  is an American animator , film director , producer , writer , production designer , video game designer , and animation instructor who is known for directing animated films , such as The Secret of NIMH  (  1982  )  , An American Tail  (  1986  )  , The Land Before Time  (  1988  )  , All Dogs Go to Heaven  (  1989  )  , and Anastasia  (  1997  )  , and for his involvement in the LaserDisc game Dragon 's Lair  (  1983  )  .

claim: The Land Before Time's director was Don Bluth.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Gary Wayne Goldman  (  born November 17 , 1944  )  is an American film producer , director , animator , writer and voice actor , he is well known for working on films with Don Bluth such as Anastasia , An American Tail , and The Land Before Time .

claim: The Land Before Time's director was Don Bluth.
premise_source_doc_sentence: It was the second theatrical sequel to not be directed by Don Bluth  (  as most sequels to Don Bluth films , such as The Land Before Time , and The Secret of NIMH , were direct-to-video  )  ; the first being An American Tail : Fievel Goes West .

claim: The Land Before Time's director was Don Bluth.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Land Before Time is a 1988 American-Irish animated adventure drama film directed and produced by Don Bluth and executive produced by Steven Spielberg , George Lucas , Kathleen Kennedy , and Frank Marshall .
